BusinessName.BusinessNameLine1Txt: ARDEN SHORE CHILD AND FAMILY SERVICES

IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: TO REBUILD CHILDREN'S LIVES IN A CARING COMMUNITY. THE ORGANIZATION IS A NONPROFIT CHILD WELFARE AGENCY THAT PROVIDES SERVICES TO STATE WARDS AND THE COMMUNITY AT LARGE.
IRS990.MissionDesc: TO REBUILD CHILDREN'S LIVES IN A CARING COMMUNITY. THE ORGANIZATION IS A NONPROFIT CHILD WELFARE AGENCY THAT PROVIDES SERVICES TO STATE WARDS AND THE COMMUNITY AT LARGE.
IRS990.Desc: CASE MANAGEMENT: THE CASE MANAGEMENT DIVISION IS COMPRISED OF INTACT FAMILY SERVICES AND FOSTER CARE SERVICES. INTACT FAMILY SERVICES PROVIDES A FULL RANGE OF SERVICES TO LATINO FAMILIES TO ASSURE THE SAFETY AND WELL BEING OF CHILDREN WITH THE GOAL OF MAINTAINING INTACT FAMILIES. THE FOSTER CARE PROGRAM IS A NON-RESIDENTIAL PROGRAM PROVIDING ENGLISH AND SPANISH SPEAKING FOSTER CARE SERVICES TO CHILDREN OF ALL AGES IN TEMPORARY TO LONG-TERM HOME SETTINGS.

ProgSrvcAccomActy2Grp.Desc: RESIDENTIAL: THE RESIDENTIAL DIVISION IS COMPRISED OF TWO COMMUNITY BASED GROUP HOMES PROVIDING 24-HOUR THERAPEUTIC SERVICES INCLUDING, BUT NOT LIMITED TO MENTAL ASSESSMENTS, INDIVIDUAL TREATMENT PLANS, THERAPY, AND MILIEU SERVICES. THE ORGANIZATION CEASED THE RESIDENTIAL PROGRAM IN NOVEMEBER OF 2022.

ProgSrvcAccomActy3Grp.Desc: BEHAVIORAL HEALTH: THE BEHAVIORAL HEALTH DIVISION PROVIDES A VARIETY OF BILINGUAL OFFICE BASE AND IN-HOME COUNSELING SERVICES TO THE COMMUNITY AT LARGE WITH THE PURPOSE OF ENHANCING AND PRESERVING PERSONAL, FAMILY AND COMMUNITY WELL-BEING.

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE AGENCY'S ENDOWMENTS CONSIST OF ONE FUND ESTABLISHED TO HELP FINANCE NEW BOARD OF TRUSTEES (THE BOARD) APPROVED PROGRAMS, GENERATE INCOME FOR OPERATING PURPOSES, IF NEEDED, AND PROVIDE FOR THE LONG-TERM FINANCIAL STABILITY OF THE AGENCY. ITS ENDOWMENTS CONSIST OF BOTH DONOR-RESTRICTED ENDOWMENT FUNDS AND FUNDS DESIGNATED BY THE BOARD TO FUNCTION AS ENDOWMENTS.
INCREASE IN VALUE OF BENEFICIAL INTEREST IN IRREVOCABLE TRUST 165,157.

GrantsOtherAsstToIndivInUSGrp.GrantTypeTxt: MISCELLANEOUS (EMERGENCY FOOD, INITIAL PLACEMENT NEEDS, EMERGENCY RENT, MENTORING, ETC)

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: ANY NONCASH ASSISTANCE IS GIVEN DIRECTLY TO THE ELIGIBLE INDIVIDUALS FOR USE AS THEY SEE FIT OR FOR A SOCIAL WORKER TO DISTRIBUTE. CASH ASSISTANCE THAT IS GIVEN DIRECTLY TO INDIVIDUALS IS SUBSTANTIATED BY RECEIPTS TO MAKE SURE FUNDS ARE USED PROPERLY.

DORA MAYA, MARK DYBAS, AND MAURELLA BOCHENKO PARTICIPATED IN A SUPPLEMENTAL NON-QUALIFIED RETIREMENT PLAN. DORA, MARK, AND MAURELLA ARE ELIGIBLE TO RECEIVE A CASH PAYMENT AFTER RETIREMENT BASED ON THEIR YEARS OF SERVICE AND ANNUAL SALARY FOR THE PRECEDING TWO YEARS.

RESIDENTIAL: THE RESIDENTIAL DIVISION IS COMPRISED OF TWO COMMUNITY BASED GROUP HOMES PROVIDING 24-HOUR THERAPEUTIC SERVICES INCLUDING, BUT NOT LIMITED TO MENTAL ASSESSMENTS, INDIVIDUAL TREATMENT PLANS, THERAPY AND MILIEU SERVICES. THE GROUP HOME PROGRAM WAS CLOSED ON 11/30/2022.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE 990 IS REVIEWED BY THE PRESIDENT/CEO, DIRECTOR OF FINANCE, AND THE FINANCE AND AUDIT COMMITTEES OF THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 12C
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: DISCLOSURE STATEMENTS ARE SUBMITTED ANNUALLY BY EACH COVERED PERSON. IF IT HAS BEEN DETERMINED THAT A CONFLICT OF INTEREST EXISTS, A COURSE OF ACTION TO RESOLVE THE CONFLICT WILL BE DETERMINED.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 15
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: OFFICERS AND KEY EMPLOYEES COMPENSATION IS DETERMINED WHEN HIRED BASED OFF MARKET RATES AND THERE IS AN EMPLOYEE CONTRACT WRITTEN UP. THIS CONTRACT STATES WHAT THEIR ANNUAL MERIT INCREASE MAXIMUM (FOR EXAMPLE, THEY CAN RECEIVE UP TO 5% ANNUALLY). IF THE ORGANIZATION BELIEVES THEY SHOULD RECEIVE ABOVE THEIR CONTRACTED INCREASE RATE, THE EXECUTIVE COMMITTEE WILL DISCUSS AND VOTE. ALL COMPENSATION IS REVIEWED AND APPROVED BY A COMMITTEE OF THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS AND COMPARED TO RELEVANT COMPARABLE DATA. DELIBERATION AND DECISION IS DOCUMENTED IN THE MINUTES OF BOARD MEETINGS. THIS PROCESS WAS LAST CONDUCTED IN 2022.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ORGANIZATION MAKES ITS GOVERNING DOCUMENTS, CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY AND FINANCIAL STATEMENTS AVAILABLE TO THE PUBLIC UPON REQUEST.
INCREASE/DECREASE IN VALUE OF BENEFICIAL INTEREST IN IRREVOCABLE TRUST 165,157.
